title: Good idea but app needs improvement
comment: Wish there was an option to change camera settings.

title: Front Camera doesn't work
comment: whenever  I start with front camera this thing pops up "unable to focus"  and stops working.  Back camera works fine. Currently using SM-G530F

title: Very small file sizes
comment: While it does work, it force closed 3 times on a Verizon Galaxy Note 4.  The photos are sized at 1/2 Meg a piece while normal photos are around 4 Meg file sizes. Would be nice if it was able to produce full sized photos.  Thanks for the quick response. I'm looking forward to using it at full  (or close to full) resolution.
I am planning to add a preference to control capture resolution.

title: Please!!
comment: Great app. Please add gesture "shortcuts to start the capturing" for launchers!! Like nova 4.0

title: Unable to focus
comment: If is on auto focus after the first shoot app stop and say unable to focus and I can't save pics on my sd card directly

title: Issue
comment: There is no video after shooting the video ? Really ?
Please read the description. ChronoSnap is designed to create a sequence of images, not a video.

title: Great app. How ever
comment: Little confused when comes to.focus. if picked auto.. Does this means it will focus for every photo? Or does it auto focus on first image and then locks the focus? And what is none? Is that infinity ? Some clarification. Will be nice. Thanks. : "thanks for clarification"
"auto" means that the app will focus before each shot and "none" means that the app will not make any attempt to focus the camera.

title: Nice app
comment: very good app and thanks for the updates
I have fixed both of these issues in the latest update (1.0.5). The images are added to the gallery immediately and it is now possible to specify any amount of time for the capture interval.

title: Time interval must be reduced.
comment: Time interval cannot be reduced below 5 seconds. For me, 5 seconds are much. Reduce it to at least 2.
With the latest update (1.0.5), it is now possible to specify any amount of time for the capture interval.

title: Wish it worked
comment: Doesn't seem to work on note 3. Just freezes and must fc. Looked promising.  Love the simple ui.
We have released an update that (hopefully) resolves this issue.

title: Pretty cool app.. does what it says..
comment: I just love this app.. simple ui and efficient working make this app cooler.. and first ever time lapse app..
